These vile beasts were not much bigger than men, but attacked with ferocity unlike anything on Earth. Despite the best efforts of the world’s armies, the Kaijin invasion spread across the planet like a disease.   \n  \nApproximately 400 years later, an estimated 5 billion Kaijin inhabit Earth, with only a fraction of the human race remaining. Over those 400 hundred years, it was survival of the fittest. Only the most exceptional from each generation would survive…and it is believed that for this reason, the newest generation have made an evolutionary jump. Incredible speed, incredible strength, telekinetic powers, lightning reflexes, and even super dense exoskeleton’s are just a few examples of how they evolved.  \n  \nA small team of these remarkable humans has formed in New L.A., and decide to head East in search of others like them. They need all the help they can get as they battle Kaijin and other obstacles, on their way to the rift site in Japan. Along the way, they also discover that it’s not as black and white as good versus evil. The 2 races have more in common than anyone could have imagined. You absolutely must read that book. It's very French New Wave, very simple and very beautiful. At the end, one can almost touch the texture, the skin and the kimono of the girl. Yukiko's Spinach, it's a painting and a short movie at the same time, hung on several plates of a comic book. »  \n  \nFrom Pascal Ory, Lire:  \n  \n« This is one of the most surprising books in the history of bande dessinée. Nevertheless, he’s pretty well connected. The King and Queen of his country of Krisna happen to be old college friends. But his natural affinity for the suit’s operating mechanism may just turn Arrow into the most important player of all.\n\n\n---\nOfficial Release:\n- Indonesian release by Elex Media","pt-br":"Tudo se passa no continente de **Cruzon**, onde recentemente começou uma guerra entre a nação de Atenas e o **Reino de Krisna**. Qualquer piloto que queira assumir o comando de uma dessas poderosas máquinas deve ser capaz de manipular o quartzo à vontade.\n\nDe fato, essa característica, que parece extraordinária e até mesmo proveniente da feitiçaria, é incrivelmente comum entre os humanos, e podemos contar nos dedos aqueles que não foram dotados dessa habilidade. Rygart Arrow, o protagonista da história e amigo íntimo do Rei de Krisna (**Hodr**), é um deles. No entanto, é justamente essa falta de poder que o leva a assumir o comando de um dos robôs do passado, durante uma de suas raras visitas à capital do reino. **Tudo indica que o antiquado - mas fabuloso! - Golem foi projetado especificamente para Rygart.** Depois de tentar negar a si mesmo a possibilidade de controlar o Golem, o garoto se dará conta da responsabilidade que recaiu sobre seus ombros e da importância que sua intervenção pode ter na guerra em Cruzon.","ru":"Континент Крузон. cd5b90ec-6d33-47cd-bd08-d13ab5f30b11:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"cd5b90ec-6d33-47cd-bd08-d13ab5f30b11","title":{"en":"Yaguruma Kennosuke"},"altTitles":[{"ja":"矢車剣之助"}],"lastChapter":"33","description":{"en":"\"My surname is Yaguruma, my name is Kennosuke!\" The definitive versionof Takashi Horie's historical drama manga is back here!! Kennosuke, a boy swordsman under Ooka Echizen no kami, confronts the villain who aims to overthrow the shogunate!\n\nSynopsis \nof the magistrate's office Mysterious incidents occur one after another in which conspirators suddenly die one after another!Kennosuke, who was present at the crime scene, is accused of being a suspect.What is the truth behind the incident...!?\n\nCommentary \n\"KennosukeYaguruma'', which began serialization in Kobunsha's \"Shonen'' in 1957, is one of Horie Takashi's representative period drama works, along with \"Tsubakuro Hood'' and \"Tenma Tenpei.''It is. Under the secret orders of the famous magistrate Ooka Echizen no Kami, Kennosuke Yaguruma, a master of swords and guns, transforms into the black-masked \"Emperor of the Night'' to solve cases. Then, the villains with their unique weapons and costumes go on a rampage against Kennosuke, and the action, which is not typical of historical dramas, became very popular, and this work was made into a movie in 1957 and a TV drama in 1959. Ta. The drama version is also famous for the role of Kennosuke by Shigeo Tezuka, one of the original members of the male idol group \"Three Funkies.'' The flashy action of this work is a characteristic of Horie's works, and is reminiscent not only of later historical dramas, but also works such as \"Hammer Kit'' and \"Gun King.'' This time, all episodes of the \"Shonen'' series are recorded, and the 6 volumes are divided into two parts: \"Shippuu Hen'' and \"Jinrai Hen''."},"links":{"amz":"https://www.amazon.co.jp/s?k=矢車剣之助\u0026i=digital-text\u0026crid=1X3200C0FPBN9\u0026sprefix=矢車剣之助%2Cdigital-text%2C368\u0026ref=nb_sb_noss_1","bw":"series/317015"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"shounen","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"33771934-028e-4cb3-8744-691e866a923e","name":{"en":"Historical"}},{"id":"391b0423-d847-456f-aff0-8b0cfc03066b","name":{"en":"Action"}},{"id":"489dd859-9b61-4c37-af75-5b18e88daafc","name":{"en":"Ninja"}},{"id":"81183756-1453-4c81-aa9e-f6e1b63be016","name":{"en":"Samurai"}}]}

It was fortunate that her mother was a strong woman, who knew the ways of the world and thought differently. She promised to raise her daughters well and protect them from bullying, not to mention that Xiangzhi's sisters all earned their keep, and were as tough as they were smart. Xiangzhi herself became good friends with the young boy Rock, brought to her by a mysterious old man — and yet, she failed to notice that her little quirks that surpass ordinary children were noticed by an old woman from the village who held hidden depths...","zh":"35岁的女外科医生苏心语突发意外后穿越到了古代一个婴儿体内，成为陶六平家的第七个女儿，有着现代成人思维的她成为了不会说话的婴儿香枝儿，她隐忍不发，隐藏着自己的秘密慢慢长大，并在这个男尊女卑的世界里寻找好好活下去的方法，好在母亲王氏是个要强的女人，见过世面，思维与众不同，她誓要将这几个女儿好好养大，不被任何人欺负，而香枝的几个姐姐们也都非常争气，强势而且聪明，香枝更是和一个神秘老人带来的男婴石头成了亲密的朋友，然而她不知道她的一些超出孩童范围的小举动，被村里一个深藏不露的老婆婆发现了……"},"links":{"al":"141961","ap":"pretty-peasant-girl","mu":"178947","raw":"https://ac.qq.com/Comic/ComicInfo/id/639991"},"originalLanguage":"zh","publicationDemographic":"shounen","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"391b0423-d847-456f-aff0-8b0cfc03066b","name":{"en":"Action"}},{"id":"3e2b8dae-350e-4ab8-a8ce-016e844b9f0d","name":{"en":"Long Strip"}},{"id":"423e2eae-a7a2-4a8b-ac03-a8351462d71d","name":{"en":"Romance"}},{"id":"4d32cc48-9f00-4cca-9b5a-a839f0764984","name":{"en":"Comedy"}},{"id":"acc803a4-c95a-4c22-86fc-eb6b582d82a2","name":{"en":"Wuxia"}},{"id":"ace04997-f6bd-436e-b261-779182193d3d","name":{"en":"Isekai"}},{"id":"e5301a23-ebd9-49dd-a0cb-2add944c7fe9","name":{"en":"Slice of Life"}},{"id":"f5ba408b-0e7a-484d-8d49-4e9125ac96de","name":{"en":"Full Color"}}]}

Ten years have passed since that fateful day, leaving Raku's memory of her faded. But he still holds a relic of their relationship together—a locked pendant, which his childhood friend holds the key to. He hopes to reunite with her one day, despite not remembering what she looks like.  \n  \nNow a first-year student at Bonyari High School, Raku attempts to live a normal life, dreaming of becoming a public servant and marrying his crush Kosaki Onodera. However, this isn't as easy as it seems, as he is the unwilling heir to a large yakuza family, and Raku can't escape from his duties when the American Bee Hive gang wages war on his family's turf. In order to forge peace between the two feuding families, Raku is forced into a fake romantic relationship with Chitoge Kirisaki, the beautiful daughter of the Bee Hive's leader. The two quickly come to hate each other, but have to learn to live together and pretend to be deeply in love in order to keep their families at bay.  \n  \nHowever, Raku's quest for the key to his pendant isn't becoming easier as more girls—who were all involved with his pendant in some way—enter his life. All living organisms, including mankind, have been wiped off the face of the planet. The government, who had foreseen this outcome, took measures to counter the worst-case scenario. In particular was Project “7 SEEDS”, in which five sets of seven gifted young men and women were carefully selected and placed into teams (Spring, Summer A, Summer B, Autumn and Winter). Each participant was then put under cryogenic sleep in hope of preserving the continued existence of mankind.  \n  \nWhen those men and women awoke, they found themselves suddenly thrust into a cruel world. Для этих людей были приготовлены убежища, где были семена и книги — инструкции по выживанию.  \n  \nШестнадцатилетняя девушка очнулась на тонущем судне. Она оказалась в компании незнакомцев, которые тоже не понимают, как оказались на этом корабле.
